page.title: 19TRADE
page.content: Most of Sawley shops are on the Tamworth Road and vary from local Co-operative Store, General Food Shop, Bakery, Butchery, Fish and Chip Shop, 'Off Licence', Chemist, Hardware, Plumber, Electrician, Launderette, Newsagent, Coal Merchant, Ladies and Gentlemen's Hairdresser, Building Society Insurance Broker and a Cash Register Shop. New Sawley has Grocery Shop selling fruit, vegetables and meat, a Chemist, Newsgent, Do-It-Yourself Shop, Haberdashery and a Security Firm. There are a number of garages in Sawley some selling petrol and diesel oil, others also sell new and second hand cars. Shardlow has a General Store, Chandlery Shop & a former bottling warehouse retails animl foodstuffs.an artist paints canal designs.
